summary: This is an email chain from October 2019 regarding the FBI Victim Services Division's efforts to notify and invite victims of Jeffrey Epstein to briefings in Miami and New York. It involves coordination between FBI victim specialists and attorneys representing victims, including the handling of a deceased victim's next of kin.

persons.name: Ms.
persons.context: An FBI Victim Specialist from the New York Field Office who is organizing briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein and coordinating with attorneys to notify their clients.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in Miami
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division is hosting a briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein at the Miami Field Office.

events.title: FBI Victim Briefing in New York
events.description: The FBI Victim Services Division is hosting a briefing for victims of Jeffrey Epstein at the New York Field Office.

keyFacts: The FBI Victim Services Division was actively organizing briefings for victims of Jeffrey Epstein in October 2019.
The communication involves coordination with attorneys representing victims to facilitate notification and attendance.
A specific deceased victim is mentioned, prompting internal discussion about outreach to her next of kin.
The FBI was seeking updated contact information for certain victims whose details were highlighted as missing.
The email chain shows the FBI using the address victimservices@fbi.gov for victim outreach related to the Epstein case.
